Course_Title: Select 18 credits in Political Science, include at least one course in each of the following areas: American, Comparative, International Relations, and Theory
Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Select at least 6 credits at the 400 level.
